title: Is Bitcoin Bull Turning Bearish on the Crypto?
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) has seen wild swings lately, testing the nerves of even seasoned investors. Just weeks ago, the cryptocurrency surged past $126,000, fueled by optimism around regulatory shifts and institutional adoption. But that high was short-lived. In a sharp reversal, Bitcoin plunged below $100,000 amid broader market pressures, including profit-taking and macroeconomic concerns. Today, Bitcoin ... title: Hidden Hijackers: The Apps Stealthily Mining Bitcoin on Your Device
description: Uncover the hidden world of apps secretly mining Bitcoin on your devices, draining resources and posing security risks. This deep dive explores detection methods, recent threats, and protective strategies, drawing from sources like Yahoo News and McAfee. Stay vigilant to safeguard your tech in 2025's crypto landscape.
